trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around February 28th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was tacking trash out to the dumpster when I looked up and saw a row of lights red orange and white, and some lights were pulsing. The object was directly north from my position (Thomas Guide page 562 G5) and during my observation two planes landing at Burbank crossed West to East. The object did not move for several minutes eventually it slowly became smaller and rose somewhat in the sky. I watched it for about 5 minutes, no sound, eventually it became very small and I could no longer see it.
Summary: A row of four or more lights red orange and white pulsing
